title: Essex Wilderness
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
William Crozier [1930-2011], London, England; Drian Galleries, London, England [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 77, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Drian Galleries.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International as a gift of Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA. Payment to Drian Galleries was sent on November 24, 1961; receipt was acknowledged by the gallery on November 28, 1961.
